opennlp.ccg.realize
Interface Hypertagger

All Superinterfaces:
SupertaggerAdapter
All Known Implementing Classes:
ZLMaxentHypertagger
public interface Hypertagger
extends SupertaggerAdapter

A hypertagger is a realization supertagger. It must extend the SupertaggerAdapter interface for plugging a supertagger into the lexicon.

Version:
$Revision: 1.5 $, $Date: 2009/08/24 01:56:14 $
Author:
Michael White

Nested Class Summary
 
Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface opennlp.ccg.lexicon.SupertaggerAdapter
SupertaggerAdapter.LexLogProb
 
Method Summary
 void mapPreds(List<SatOp> preds)
          Maps the given elementary predications to their predicted categories, so that the beta-best categories can be returned by calls to setPred and getSupertags.
 void setPred(int index)
          Sets the current elementary predication to the one with the given index, so that the beta-best categories for it can be returned by a call to getSupertags.
 void storeGoldStdPredInfo(String goldStdPredInfo)
          Stores the gold standard pred info, for use in discriminative training.
 
Methods inherited from interface opennlp.ccg.lexicon.SupertaggerAdapter
getBetas, getCurrentBetaValue, getSupertags, hasLessBetas, hasMoreBetas, nextBeta, previousBeta, resetBeta, resetBetaToMax, setBetas, setIncludeGold
 

Method Detail

mapPreds

void mapPreds(List<SatOp> preds)
Maps the given elementary predications to their predicted categories, so that the beta-best categories can be returned by calls to setPred and getSupertags.

setPred

void setPred(int index)
Sets the current elementary predication to the one with the given index, so that the beta-best categories for it can be returned by a call to getSupertags.

storeGoldStdPredInfo

void storeGoldStdPredInfo(String goldStdPredInfo)
Stores the gold standard pred info, for use in discriminative training. The string consists of space delimited tokens, where each token is a colon-separated list of fields, with the first field containing the nominal id, and the second field the gold supertag.
